languages.text: "Быть может, Лорд-инквизитор осудит меня, когда я предоставлю свой рапорт. Но я готов ответить за свои действия. Что касается выживших... их судьба — в твоих руках, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, Лорд Инквизитор осудит меня, когда я предоставлю свой рапорт. Но я готов ответить за свои действия. Что касается выживших... их судьба — в твоих руках, Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, Лорд-инквизитор осудит меня, когда я предоставлю свой рапорт. Но я готов ответить за свои действия. Что касается выживших... их судьба — в твоих руках, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."
"Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."
"Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."
"Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “或许当我提交报告的时候，大审判官会谴责我的决定，但我愿意为我的行为负责。至于那些幸存者……他们的命运掌握在你的手中，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “或许当我提交报告的时候，审判长会谴责我的决定，但我愿意为我的行为负责。至于那些幸存者……他们的命运掌握在你的手中，行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Tal vez el Lord Inquisidor me condene cuando presente mi informe, pero estoy dispuesto a responder de mis actos. En cuanto a los supervivientes... su destino está en sus manos, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez el Lord Inquisidor me condene cuando presente mi informe, pero estoy dispuesto a responder de mis actos. En cuanto a los supervivientes... su destino está en sus manos, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「おそらくロード・インクィジターは、私の報告書を非難するだろう。しかし、私は自分の行動を説明する用意がある。生存者については…彼らの運命はあなたの手に委ねられているのだ、ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらくロード・インクィジターは、私の報告書を非難するだろう。しかし、私は自分の行動を説明する用意がある。生存者については…彼らの運命はあなたの手に委ねられているのだ、ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: "Möglicherweise wird der Großinquisitor mich verurteilen, wenn ich meinen Bericht vorlege. Aber ich werde die Verantwortung für meine Taten übernehmen. Und was die Überlebenden angeht ... deren Schicksal liegt in Euren Händen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Möglicherweise wird der Großinquisitor mich verurteilen, wenn ich meinen Bericht vorlege. Aber ich werde die Verantwortung für meine Taten übernehmen. Und was die Überlebenden angeht ... deren Schicksal liegt in Euren Händen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: « Il est possible que le seigneur inquisiteur me blâme lorsque je lui ferai mon rapport, mais je suis prêt à assumer la responsabilité de mes actes. Quant aux survivants... leur sort est entre vos mains, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Il est possible que le seigneur inquisiteur me blâme lorsque je lui ferai mon rapport, mais je suis prêt à assumer la responsabilité de mes actes. Quant aux survivants... leur sort est entre vos mains, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun affına sığınarak raporumu bildirmek isterim. Yaptıklarımın hesabını vermeye hazırım. Hayatta kalanlara gelince... Kaderleri, Hür Tacir'in elindedir."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor will condemn me when I present my report. But I am prepared to account for my actions. As for the survivors... their fate is in your hands, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun affına sığınarak raporumu bildirmek isterim. Yaptıklarımın hesabını vermeye hazırım. Hayatta kalanlara gelince... Kaderleri, Hür Tacir'in elindedir."
